settings.text:
No matter where you are in the research to painting pipeline, we’ve got you. Save yourself time and cash by using our nifty paint calculator to find out how many litres of paint you'll need to transform your space from drab to fab. Simply type in the sqft of your space and we'll do some magic mathematics specially for you. This way, you'll never have too much or too little paint — it'll be just right.

Applicable to all paint variants — Gush Cair, Gush Cair Fresh and Gush Prepair.

settings.title: Quality in all quantities.
settings.description:
No matter where you are in the research to painting pipeline, we’ve got you. 

Type in the sqft of your space and find out how many litres of paint you’ll need. 

Applicable to all paint variants — Gush Cair, Gush Cair Fresh and Gush Prepair.

settings.title: Paint Calculator
settings.text_content:
Quality in all paint quantities.
Save yourself time (and cash) by using our nifty paint calculator to find out how many litres of paint you’ll need to transform your space from drab to fab. Simply type in the sqft of your space and we’ll do some magic mathematics specially for you. We always recommend 1 coat of sealer and 2 coats of paint. Applicable to all paint variants — Gush Cair, Gush Cair Fresh and Gush Prepair.

Approximations
As a general rule of thumb, 1 litre of Gush paint gives you 2 coats for a 5 -6m² surface area.

Regular bedroom: ~ 7L. 5L for walls, 2L for ceiling.

Master bedroom: ~8L.

These approximations may differ from home to home, depending on the number of walls and sizes.

Sealer: 1 coat of sealer is all you’ll need. Once you’ve determined your paint quantity, divide that by 2.
